name: SageLink, Inc.
description: Manufacturer of footwear products intended to sell hand-knitted shoes. The company offers shoes whose upper portion is constructed from a blend of knitted fibers and is fully recyclable thus making them lighter, and more flexible, and ensuring that the shoes will last for a longer period of time, enabling customers to buy hand-knitted shoes for more comfort and style.
one_liner: Manufacturer of footwear products intended to sell hand-knitted shoes. The company offers shoes whose upper portion is constructed from a blend of knitted fibers and is fully recyclable thus making them lighter, and more flexible, and ensuring that the shoes will last for a longer period of time, enabling customers to buy hand-knitted shoes for more comfort and style.
